amendment.description: An amendment numbered 55 printed in Part B of House Report 118-551 to prohibit the Secretary of Defense from paying for or reimbursing expenses relating to abortion services.
amendment.purpose: Amendment prohibits the Secretary of Defense from paying for or reimbursing expenses relating to abortion services.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Van Duyne amendment (A031) Agreed to by recorded vote: 214 - 207 (Roll no. 263).

action.text: Amendment (A031) offered by Ms. Van Duyne.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Van Duyne amendment (A031) Agreed to by recorded vote: 214 - 207 (Roll no. 263).
